Welcome to Cat Friends' Home!

Hey fellow cat pals,

Join our fabulous feline band 'Cat Friends' for a heartwarming blend of music, dance, and pawsitive vibes. Whether you're a curious kitten or a lifelong cat lover, there's a meow-sical moment right here. We'd love for you to experience our musical shows with us, hang out together at The Cutest Cat Café, or why not invite us to your special occasions!

From cozy cafés to musical theatres, The Cat Friends are ready to brighten your day — one paw-some performance at a time. Come join the fun and feel the magic that only a musical cat family can bring.

Your pet friends are here to make music and memories with you!

Book now

Hang out with us!

Café meetups

Free entry - open everyday, shows on Tue-Thu 16:00

Have a sip of coffee with us at The Cutest Cats Café! The perfect spot to relax and unwind in a cozy atmosphere with our beloved Cat Friends and meet their other furry friends, too.

See address below!

Musical shows

From 120 kr

Experience our The Cat Friends Musical Show - a live performance full of whiskers, rhythm, and joy. With original songs, choreography, and larger-than-life cat personalities, this concert is a celebration for all ages.

Check it out!

Private performances

Inquire with us!

Invite us over to your birthdays, school assemblies, or work gatherings! We'll bring the fun and live music, you'll bring family and friends. What a blast it will be!

Book now!
